prompt: Which of the following instructions for the computer is part of the word processing software?
feedback: A software program like this word processor gives instructions to the computer about what to do, and that would include what paragraph formatting options to give the user. The other instructions are all choices that are based on input from the person using the computer... though the software might contain a default location to save files, the user chooses where to save a particular file like this letter. The user will also choose what the letter should say and what the file name should be.
